constituent: erect, add, power, muscle, arnold, mouth, tree, wood
heisigStory: Add . . . trees. Hint: if you ever played with an "Erector Set" or "Tinker Toys" as a child, don't pass up the opportunity to relate it to this kanji's key word and the element for trees.
koohiiStory2: I´m not sure I know about erector sets or tinker toys but I do know about jenga. You play by taking wooden pieces from the middle of a wooden tower and adding them to the top. In this way you erect a very unstable structure.
myStory: giá treo, treo. chữ Giá. thêm vào cây để treo đồ
readingExamples: 架かる (か.かる), 架ける (か.ける)
